dialogue: In the Chocolate Syrup Galaxy, Sector 51479.
At the easternmost end of planet Nascar
outlooking an asteroid belt.
Laaaaaaaaaadies and gentlemeeeeeeeeen!
I'm happy to announce the beginning of the
finale of the 31st Scelerisque Spatium Circuit!
On your marks!
Get set!
GO!
The racers set off, blasting from the starting platform.
What a heated race! All of these competitors are among
the best talents from their home planets!
But leading the pack are the absolute best of the best!
In third place is the Crushing Capri!
He's the oldest of all the racers here,
and most definitely the most experienced!
Just ahead of him is the Tenatious Tea!
She's been the odds-on favorite, being
our champion of the last circuit!
But blasting ahead in first place is…
Hah, left all those losers in the dust!
The Spry Spirytus!
They're the youngest blackhorse we've seen all season!
Barely 19 and yet already competing with the best!
They caused quite the upset in this year's circuit,
coming out of nowhere and winning race after race!
That's it, keep singing my praises.
Hell yeah, I’m so gonna win this thing!
The lead racers are now reaching the finish line!
Second and Third are neck-and-neck, but the winner is…
The Spry Spirytus!!
Wooo!!
Woooooo!
Wooo!
Spirytus collects her prize money and begins to leave
the race area, But they're interrupted
on their way out by a mysterious figure.
Hey now, that was some nice racing there!
I wonder if 'The Spry Spirytus' is just what you go by
or is there something else you prefer?
